modName: Gestick Raptio - The Best Companion Ever Alive in Tamriel
summary: Gestick Raptio as you can see is a companion. He wears custom clothes and weapons. He is mainly unique for his torch that lights up a blue/green aura around him. Acts natural and will walk around if you don\'t do anything with him or go into combat. Also, he is smiling all the time.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=10]Gestick Raptio[/size]
[youtube]pS9gJJgRmPA[/youtube]
The pretty purpley flowers clothing at the end was 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28788/?][color=pink]Deathbell Princess[/color][/url]

[size=5]
[color=green]
Hello! Here\'s the best male companion in Tamriel. Just download and you\'ll see. He is very aggressive, but he is smiling most of the time.
[/color]
-----------------------------------------------------
[color=yellow]
Post in comments if you have an issues with the mod. [/color]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Required mods:[/b]
[color=purple]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii\'s Skyhair[/url]

Just the main version with both male and female as of now July 1, 2013

It is ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full
[/color]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
With Nexus or Overwrite the data folder or Copy contents inside my Data folder and paste into your data folder. lol.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red]
Don\'t tamper, modify, re-upload my mod without my permission.[/size] [/color][/center]
author: DinoCarbon
